name: AIRPIX DEVICES

idea:
We are not content with simply offering primary packaging solutions, thus extending our

line of operations into the printing industry, with an aim to serve our customers for all

their printing & designing requirements under one roof. Our offset division comprise of

state of art printing machines for production and handling of various types of printing

jobs. Our folding cartons are manufactured to a high standard and highly customisable,

using latest technologies we are able to ensure color consistency and adherence to standards

across large batches of cartons. We offer solution that range across hot foil stamping,

metallised cartons, embossed cartons, braille cartons, MET PET cartons, labels in sheet

and roll form etc.. for secondary packaging. We have skilled and trained labours to manage

pre press & post press activities starting from designing to fnal packing & dispatch of the

product. We believe in creating value for our customers, we understand our customers

requirements, collaborate with the customers, and optimize the specification of the print

project – be it size, paper selection, so as to optimize the cost and still produce the product

as per our customers requirement.

No matter how big the job, we have the technology, expertise and capacity to deliver. We

are able to have a complete control of customer service, Pre-press, printing, finishing and

delivering products to local or international locations. By maintaining this control we

manage to supply products where you want it, how you want it and when you want it.
name: PURE IMPRESSIONS PRINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Company provides Generic alternative medicines by purchasing medicine through franchisor and selling medicines at economical prices to the consumers by giving discount of 15-80% via its network of tech enabled stores with highly trained pharmacist. The Company medicines are manufactured by top companies and are same as marketed medicines with same composition and content and are sold at reasonable price. The Company provides innovative services by creating/increasing awareness, health camps and knowledge among customers about generics medicines. The Company sells generic equivalent branded medicines through its 47 franchisee stores in Mumbai. The Company has double sales per square feet than other organization in this sector. The Company is started by IIT Bombay Alumni.
Patent medicines are very expensive so the Company is providing affordable healthcare, generic and branded medicines at economical prices to consumers through its retail stores. The Company through its stores gives customers the power of choice, the power of rights medicines and the power of true price. The Company provides innovative service by creating/increasing awareness and knowledge among customers about generics medicines. India is primarily a generic market and there exists a huge gap between the ex-factory cost and selling price of medicines. On top of it, medicine turns out to be the highest out of pocket spend out of the total healthcare expenditure. The Company has built centers where the Company educate consumers about generics and significantly enhance the accessibility to medicines. The Company provide health related awareness, health check-ups and medical vans to the communities as a not for profit initiatives and providing maximum benefit through technology at minimum margin to consumer.
name: ZIPPIN PHARMA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Seal – www.sealripped.com 

SEAL Overview 

SEAL is an education focused start-up, run by Bayside Media Private Limited, founded in April 2016 in Mumbai. The company trains undergraduate students and places them in their first job. The company headquartered in Mumbai run their flagship Management Training program for undergraduate students who are studying in first, second or third years and pursuing a degree or diploma program. 

Seal’s management training program is a one-month intensive, classroom-based training program with option for web based online classes in select modules. 

Key modules of the course include: 

• Human Resource management 

• Sales & Marketing 

• Operations Management 

• Finance 

• Business Communication. 

Additionally, the company also offers a range of courses under elective modules. 

Target Students & Market Size 

Students pursuing undergraduate degrees namely: 

• Bachelor of Management Studies (BMS) 

• Bachelor of Business Application (BBA) 

• Bachelor of Commerce (BCom) 

• Bachelor of Science (BSc.) 

• Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) 

• Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) 

• Bachelor of Pharmacy (BPharma) 

• Bachelor of Microbiology 

Total number of under-graduate students in India is about 28 Million. Annually about 6 Million students graduate every year. 

Problem that Seal is Addressing 

• Lack of employable skills amongst students. 

• Curriculum is far removed from the requirements of the industry. 

• Blended rate of placements for the larger undergraduate segment is estimated at 10%-15% and that student population finds it most difficult to obtain job opportunities as freshers. 

Track Record thus far 

In the last three years, the company has trained 4000+ students and have placed 1200+ students in paid internships and full-time jobs with leading companies. 

The company only charges students a fee for the course and does not charge students or the companies for placements. 

Seal provides Interview Guarantee to its students who complete their program. 

Companies where students have been placed 

HDFC Bank, Reliance Retail, Reliance Jio, Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Tommy Hilfiger, Central, Westside, Mercedes Benz, Delhivery, Grofers, Tata Trent, Pantaloons, Carat Lane and many more.
name: BAYSIDE MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our brand PwrPup is an app-based dog walking service that provides trained, professional and insured walkers to pet parents with busy schedules.

PwrPup is an effort to provide trained and insured walkers to pet parents who do not have the time to walk their furry family members. Currently, dog walkers have no accountability and it is impossible to verify whether the dog has actually been on a walk.


The app’s tracking feature will not only report where the dog is, at any given time during the walk, it will also show the distance covered, route taken, poop and pee reports.
name: DROOL ENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Prometheus Solutions offer Technology enabled solutions in the Sector of Association / Community Management.

We do it under 2 Product Suits 

- nGauge (Association / Community Management Solutions) 
- Expolab (Event Management Solutions) 


People across the world connect with other like-minded people or members with common purpose. In India there are hundreds of thousands of Formal and Informal communities in the form of Associations, Social Platforms, Interest Groups etc. nGauge provides such communities with all the tools to operate more efficiently and communicate more effectively. 

One of the main activities of these communities is organising events. ExpoLab is a subdivision of PSS, which along with nGauge helps our clients to augment technology in their events. 

Visit our website to know more about our solutions.
name: PSS
